moduleMetadataJson.name: Multi Gather pgpass Credentials
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module will collect the contents of all users' .pgpass or pgpass.conf
          file and parse them for credentials.
author: Zach Grace <zgrace@403labs.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.
